DOC.brief_summary: To assess the safety and feasibility of using the NeuroFlo catheter to treat acute ischemic stroke patients following administration of intravenous tPA.
DOC.brief_title: Feasibility and Safety of NeuroFlo in Stroke Patients Receiving Tissue Plasminogen Activator
DOC.criteria: Ischemic stroke NIHSS between 522 Persistent clinical deficits following administration of rtPA Planned thrombectomy Aortic pathology Severe heart disease Other conditions the doctor will assess
